title: TypeScriptのエラー
bodyContent:
## jsonファイルの読み込み
jsonファイルを読み込む場合、'--resolveJsonModule'使います。

エラー内容
```
Module '@/posts/summary.json' was resolved to '/Users/chida/blog-app/posts/summary.json', but '--resolveJsonModule' is not used.
```

修正方法は、tsconfig.jsonにresolveJsonModuleを追加します。
```json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    // ...
    }
}
```



## 

```
Property '$title' does not exist on type 'CombinedVueInstance<Vue, unknown, unknown, unknown, Readonly<Record<never, any>>>'.
```

## 

```
Element implicitly has an 'any' type because expression of type 'string' can't be used to index type '{ "posts/json/20200328.json": { title: string; permalink: string; description: string; created_at: string; tags: string; dir: string; base: string; ext: string; sourceBase: string; sourceExt: string; }; ... 24 more ...; "posts/json/20200504.json": { ...; }; }'.
```
bodyHtml:
jsonファイルの読み込み

jsonファイルを読み込む場合、'--resolveJsonModule'使います。

エラー内容

Module '@/posts/summary.json' was resolved to '/Users/chida/blog-app/posts/summary.json', but '--resolveJsonModule' is not used.

修正方法は、tsconfig.jsonにresolveJsonModuleを追加します。

{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    // ...
    }
}

Property '$title' does not exist on type 'CombinedVueInstance<Vue, unknown, unknown, unknown, Readonly<Record<never, any>>>'.


Element implicitly has an 'any' type because expression of type 'string' can't be used to index type '{ "posts/json/20200328.json": { title: string; permalink: string; description: string; created_at: string; tags: string; dir: string; base: string; ext: string; sourceBase: string; sourceExt: string; }; ... 24 more ...; "posts/json/20200504.json": { ...; }; }'.
